dao

类 DaoStock

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.Dao
      • dao.DaoStock

  • public class DaoStock
extends Dao
    Data access object of Stock. Connecting class StockHistoricalPrice and table stock_stk
    作者:
    Junyang HE

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DaoStock() 

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static int addStock(Stock stk)
      add Stock in the date base.
      static int deleteStock(int id)
      delete a Stock in the data base Stock table.
      static Stock getStock(int id)
      return a specific Stock by it's id.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Stock> getStockList()
      allow to have the full list of Stock in the data base.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main for testing
      static int updateStock(Stock stk)
      update a Stock.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DaoStock

        public DaoStock()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getStock

        public static Stock getStock(int id)
        return a specific Stock by it's id.
        参数:
        id - id of the Stock
        返回:
        stk - the Stock

      • getStockList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Stock> getStockList()
        allow to have the full list of Stock in the data base.
        返回:
        the list of all the Stocks in the data base

      • addStock

        public static int addStock(Stock stk)
        add Stock in the date base.
        参数:
        stk - - Stock to add
        返回:
        the number of line add in the Stock list

      • deleteStock

        public static int deleteStock(int id)
        delete a Stock in the data base Stock table.
        参数:
        id - contain the id of the Stock we want to delete
        返回:
        the number of line delete

      • updateStock

        public static int updateStock(Stock stk)
        update a Stock. ONLY Name, Description and Price are modifiable.
        参数:
        stk - the Stock for update
        返回:
        numbers of line updated

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main for testing
        参数:
        args - Arguments
